question: Which union ministry has signed pact with defense ministry provide traditional medicine?
option2: Ministry of Environment, Forests and Climate Change
option3: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
option4: Ministry of Health and Family Welfare
explanation: The AYUSH ministry has signed a MoU with the Defence ministry to provide traditional medicine services at the armed forces’ hospitals and dispensaries. Under the MoU, ayurveda units will be established at palliative care centres at the Army Research and Referral Hospital, Air Force Hospital, Hindon in Ghaziabad and five identified ex-service men Contributory Health Scheme (ECHS) polyclinics in Delhi –NCR.
